title: SB 1186
content:
The people of the State of California enact the following. The sum of $647,443.32 is appropriated to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for payment of accepted claims from specified funds. Claims will be paid according to a schedule outlined for different funds. Total for Fund: Item 4260-101-0001 Budget Act of 2016, Program 3960022 - $2,028.06
Total for Fund: Item 5180-111-0001 Budget Act of 2016, Program 4275010 - $15,567.57
Total for Fund: Item 7100-001-0185 Budget Act of 2016, Program 5930 - $22,537.91 The Controller is required to transfer surcharges and fees to a specific budget item as requested by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The transferred amount should not exceed the total per claim filing fee and surcharge authorized by the Government Code. The California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board requests the transfer of fees and surcharges to support reimbursements. The board must report the recovered amounts to the Department of Finance within 90 days. The California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board requests appropriations from the General Fund for the payment of claims of Obie Steven Anthony III and John Smith, totaling $1,235,200. The California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board requests appropriations from the General Fund for the payment of claims totaling $1,235,200 for Michael Smith and Timothy Gantt. The California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board requests appropriations from the General Fund for the payment of claims totaling $1,235,200 for Michael Smith and Timothy Gantt. Additionally, $654,500 is appropriated for Marco Milla's claim, and $762,440 for Larry Pohlschneider's claim. The sum of $936,880 is appropriated from the General Fund to pay the claim of Luther Ed Jones, Jr. This act is an urgency statute to quickly end hardship for claimants.
